author.name: Restore an Apple device with IPSW file

fields.name: To restore your Apple device:
fields.value:
1. Download the version of iTunes for your OS from Apple's Website https://www.apple.com/itunes/ 
2. Connect your iPhone to your PC/Mac with a lightning cable.
3. Download your device's IPSW from here: https://ipsw.me
4. Click on the iPhone icon located in the top left corner of the screen. It will be on the right next to a drop down menu.
5. Hold shift and left click `Restore iPhone...` and locate the ISPW file.
